column2: "Glad to see you made it back. You didn't get hurt, did you?"
"Hey now, I was with them. You think I'd ever let something happen to some rookies?"
"That's what I was worried about. I know it was probably a lot to deal with, but it looks like you guys made it."
"Um, sir? Who is this?"
"Oh and uh... I don't think I caught your name either, sir..."
"Zeno, don't tell me you didn't even bother to introduce yourself."
"Now that you mention it, I completely forgot. I figured they already knew who I was."
"My name is Zeno. The obnoxious one here is Echo."
"Nice to meet you, and I'm not the obnoxious one."
"My name is Afin. I'm pleased to meet you."

"And this is my partner,
<%me>."
"We just joined the ARKS and have no idea what to make of anything yet..."
"Don't worry about it. You can think about it later, or investigate on your own."
"Those things we were fighting are Darkers. They are the enemies of the ARKS. That's all there is to it."
"Rather than having it explained to you, it's better that you got to see it for yourself."

"Hey, Zeno! Don't you think that's a bit much? They've been
through a lot."
"Why would I bother to put it nicely now that they've already seen it for themselves?"
"Knowing that in advance and being prepared will let you live longer in this line of work."
"Hey, why so glum? You're still alive, right? Mission complete, good work."
"But... another examinee died right in front of our eyes..."
"That comes with the territory for the ARKS. We don't have time to mourn everyone."
"Hey... hold your head up. We have to persevere, for all those who fall in battle."
"...Okay."
"That's good, Afin. If you can come to terms with this, you're already well on your way."

"But hold onto these feelings,
and don't give up. As long as you keep going, things tend to work out."
"That's cool and all, but he's just showing off. Everything he told you, he learned from his teacher."

"Hey! Don't blow my cover, Echo!
I'm allowed to quote our
teacher's wisdom."
"I wish you'd stop going off on these tangents. Don't you ever think how annoying it is for me to have to listen to you?"
"Hey! I don't get on your case for being late all the time!"
"Don't bring that up! Whatever, looks like we're almost back to the ARKS ship anyway."
"Wipe those grins off your faces, rookies! Let's go."
"The day I was waiting for"
"序章 ずっとこの日を待っていた"
